page.title: 16A Day in The Life
page.content: {Richard}"On a Saturday I usually get up at about 7.30 to watch breakfast television.I eat my breakfast at about 8.15 and then put on my tracksuit on.I leave the house at 9.30 and call for my friends who also play for the cubs football team.If we have a home match we play on the school field,if its an away match we travel by car.I have my lunch at 1.00 and then I go to Goodison Park with my dad to watch Everton play.After I have had my tea I usually watch television,especially the football. {Sharon}"On a Tuesday I get up at 7.00 and get dressed.By 7.20 I am usually eating my breakfast.I have cereal,toast and a cup of tea.I go for a paper at 8.00 and at 8.30 my brother Andrew and I go to school.We play in the playground until the 8.55 whistle.
